comment: How well did the hisiscus come thru? 0.75 lb too much? Too little?

Sorry for the late reply. Very prominent. I made the mistake of squeezing the bejesus out of the mash bag it was in to get as much of the flavor out as possible, and that may have overdone it for some folks. Still tasted good, but needed to be a little more subtle. I will try the recipe again and this time without squeezing the bag.
